thumb.title: Mockingdude [original song, Vocaloid, Lucas]
thumb.description: What the hell's a djembe? No, me neither. So it gets an airing in the intro. Tried to hit a just-behind-the-beat edginess to fit in with the just-behind-comfortable intent of the song.Not sure on the genre.Tech CornerMore clangs and thuds from Backbone (and Groove Agent); synthery from UAD, Padshop, Retrologue; Japanese violin-thing from layered Reason NN-XT samples buried under Ripley delay; pompously named "The Grand" piano from Steinberg. These are a few of my favourite things.Vocal synths from Lucas, doing stuff that I just can't manage.
